  • Stahlwalker (Blog)

    Stahlwalker (Blog)

    Jekyll is a parsing engine, bundled as a ruby gem, used to build static websites from dynamic components such as templates, partials, liquid code, markdown, etc. Jekyll is a simple static site generator.

  • Interactive Resume

    Interactive Resume

    Lucas Stahl interactive resume and portfolio or work.

  • Portfolio Template

    Portfolio Template

    Using materialize to create a single page portfolio template. Preferred tool over Bootstrap.

  • Face Recognition App

    Face Recognition App

    Using React.js, user authentication and NPM Bcrypt for password protection I created a face recognition app. Copy an image url that includes a face and test it out.

  • Clicky Game App

    Clicky Game App

    Created a memory game using React. This application breaks up the UI into components, manages component state, and respond to user events.

  • Mongo Scrape App

    Mongo Scrape App

    This app uses NPMs body-parser, cheerio, express, express-handlebars, mongoose and request to scrape news articles from the Chicago. It uses mongoDB to store the data collected.

  • Friend Finder App

    Friend Finder App

    Friend Finder application is meant to simulate a dating app. The app uses Node & Express the back end and Materialize CSS framework on the front end. For more details visit my git repository.

  • Packers Nation Invasion

    Packers Nation Invasion

    Packers Nation Invasion is a site dediated to tracking away games for the Green Bay Packers that I've attened. Site created using Materialize CSS

  • BrewIary

    BrewIary

    Languages used, Javascript, jQuery and APIs to create a brewery app to search beer and log notes. This app was designed as a beer diary, called 'BrewIary'. Firebase was included for user authentication.

  • Eat Da Burger App

    Eat Da Burger App

    A full stack web app featuring the use of Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars for view generation and a ORM. Node and MySQL are used to query and route data flow in the app.

  • BG Color Generator

    BG Color Generator

    This background generator uses Node.js and JavaSript to create perfect color palettes. For more details visit my git repository and review the README.

  • Superhero Trivia App

    Superhero Trivia App

    This superhero trivia game is based on jQuery and manipulation of the DOM. For more details visit my git repository and review the README.

  • Animal Giphy App

    Animal Giphy App

    A full stack web app featuring the use of Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars for view generation and a ORM. Node and MySQL are used to query and route data flow in the app.

  • Liri Node App

    Liri Node App

    LIRI is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. Please visit my git repository and review the README.

  • Bamazon App

    Bamazon App

    Bamazon is a Command Line Interface (CLI) app that accepts orders from customers and depletes stock from the store's inventory. It runs on Node.js and MySQL. Please visit my git repository and review the README.

  • Ripe Tomatoes

    Ripe Tomatoes

    NU group project using react, mongoDB and python to search movies and store them into a dashboard with user authentication.

  • Github Repository

    Github Repository

    My Git Repository is a digital directory or storage space where you can access my projects, and all files that Git saves. A Readme file is usually a text file that explains a bit about the project.

I love to share my experiences and new technologies.

Web design is tricky, but incredibly satisfying when all your hard work comes together. Take a look at my blog and join me as I tackle web programming.
